mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sketch C: Showing the progress of Section No. 3, U.S. Coast Survey, 1844 to 1850
Sketch C, showing the progress of Section No. 3, U.S. Coast Survey, 1844 to 1850
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: United States Coast Survey. Section III. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notation table apears just under title. [original]

Depicts triangulations in Chesapeake Bay area from Hampton Roads north to the mouth of the Susquahannah River, showing mouths of York, Rappahannock, Potomac, Patuxent and Patapsco Rivers. Also covers area of Tangier and Pocomoke Sound. Delaware Bay indicated with minimal detail. [original]
